resources.string: This action will erase your user from the database, are you sure?
This action will erase your class from the database, are you sure?
This action will erase your game from the database, are you sure?
You are going to exit the current class, are you sure?
Give us your feedback about the game, did you like it?

Time Limit can´t be less than 30
This will be shown at the top of the screen and will provide instructions to the student about what to do.

These will be the elements that the student will have to order. Write each word or number separated by an only space and then press the button just below to confirm the values. This will disable for now the writing in this field.

In this section you have to drag the elements of the second box in the correct order to the first box. Hold an element for a little bit to drag it. There\'s no need to take all the elements from the second box, you can leave someones out of the correct answer. To restart the values to drag, you can press the button at the right side of the save button, that will clean the options panel and will let you write again.

Here you have to write the correct numeric answer to the question. TThe answer can be from dates to negative numbers. After writing it you must press the button just below to confirm the value and finish editing the question. This will disable for now the writing in this field.

This area will show the previous view of what the students will see and the interaction that they can have. It is only indicative, to change the value here won´t change the correct answer. If you want to write another value you should press the button next to the save button to get enable again the writing.
You need to add 3 images to save the question
This app needs access to your file storage so that it can read photos.

Here you have to select 3 pictures of your gallery. Press on one of the three boxes to access your device images. When you have selected one and want to remove it, just press again on it and it will remove.
This area have the word or words that give meaning to the images you want to upload. The student will have to drag this words to the images uploaded, so try to be the most specific you can.
